title: Untouchable Zane
description: Untouchable Zane is a slow burn, friends to lovers, reverse age gap romance about an untouchable celebrity and the everyday woman who stole his heart before they ever met.I’m finished with men.After a string of bad relationships, I'm moving to California to start a new life.Alone.The last thing I need is Zane Elkton, a devastatingly hot celebrity, who’s twelve years younger than me, no less, messing up my plans for a fresh start.The man is untouchable and I have no clue why he’s set his sights on me.The problem is, the attraction that burns between us is hard to resist.One look at Desiree Capstone and I almost fall over.I might be losing my mind, but she’s the same woman who’s been haunting my dreams for half my life.And she’s real, standing right in front of me.I want her to know the real me, not the A-list celebrity every woman wants to get her hands on. But I’m afraid once she gets a look at my truths, she won’t like what she sees.Desire ignites and our connection grows deeper.We’re both keeping secrets. She just doesn’t know that I know what hers is.She’s my one chance at true love.But will my addiction destroy it all?
author: Debbie Cromack
